cast.overview: The former World Heavyweight Champion Rocky Balboa serves as a trainer and mentor to Adonis Johnson, the son of his late friend and former rival Apollo Creed.
cast.title: Creed

cast.overview: Between personal obligations and training for his next big fight against an opponent with ties to his family's past, Adonis Creed is up against the challenge of his life.
cast.title: Creed II

details.biography: Rocky Ciarrocchi professionally known in the wrestling and horror world as Hellter Skelter. Starred in horror films: Half Life Horror From Hell and The Evil Brew. Also was a fire nation soldier in The Last AirBender and was a Fan in the Crowd for the blockbuster film Creed. Would love to be in more horror films. Hellter Skelter has been involved in wrestling for 10 plus years, held numerous championships and wrestled all around the world. Grew up in Philadelphia, Pa. Went to wrestling school at The Monster Factory and picked up how to act by performing in front of live crowds. Also did a calendar and documentary for the calendar called Straight and Butch.
details.name: Rocky Ciarrocchi
